```{r basic_packages}
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r gpa_lm}
load('data/gpa.RData')
gpa_lm = lm(gpa ~ occasion, data=gpa)
summary(gpa_lm)
```

```{r gpa_mixed}
library(lme4)
gpa_mixed = lmer(gpa ~ occasion + (1|student), data=gpa)
summary(gpa_mixed)
```


```{r gpa_mixed_confint}
confint(gpa_mixed)
```

```{r gpa_mixed_ranef}
ranef(gpa_mixed)$student %>% head(5)
```
